analysis.description:
DTF1.transfer (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#157-174) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-knc.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#167)
	-dai.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#168-172)

Reentrancy in DTF1.fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#217-238):
	External calls:
	- (kncExpectedPrice) = kyber.getExpectedRate(ieth,knc,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#218-219)
	- (daiExpectedPrice) = kyber.getExpectedRate(ieth,dai,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#220-221)
	- kncCount = kyber.trade.value(kncCost)(ieth,kncCost,knc,address(this),2 ** 256 - 1,1,0) (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#223-226)
	- daiCount = kyber.trade.value(daiCost)(ieth,daiCost,dai,address(this),2 ** 256 - 1,1,0) (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#227-230)
	External calls sending eth:
	- kncCount = kyber.trade.value(kncCost)(ieth,kncCost,knc,address(this),2 ** 256 - 1,1,0) (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#223-226)
	- daiCount = kyber.trade.value(daiCost)(ieth,daiCost,dai,address(this),2 ** 256 - 1,1,0) (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#227-230)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _totalSupply (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#236-237)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#235-236)

Reentrancy in DTF1.transfer (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#157-174):
	External calls:
	- knc.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#167)
	- dai.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#168-172)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _totalSupply (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#172)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/30/0x67bc5f55c15181d753a46d0b46344df0ef4e982d.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
